name: Tweeps Overrun
description:
In Tweeps Overrun, an action/gestion game you play as the Reaper and your goal is to balance the population in the level. 
You can Grab, Slay and teleport to achieve that goal.

If all the areas are in the green, you win.

BUT, if all the areas are in the red, you lose. 

-----

Created for a Game Design Class by 3 game designer junior.
